/* EmployeeMapper.getMemberList */
SELECT A.EMAIL, A.NAME, B.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS POSITION_NAME, A.QUIT_AT FROM TB_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE_DETAIL B ON B.DETAIL_CODE = A.DEPARTMENT LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE_DETAIL C ON C.DETAIL_CODE = A.POSITION WHERE ROLE_CODE != 'ADMIN' ORDER BY A.NAME

/* EmployeeMapper.getMemberListCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE_DETAIL B ON B.DETAIL_CODE = A.DEPARTMENT LEFT JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE_DETAIL C ON C.DETAIL_CODE = A.POSITION WHERE ROLE_CODE != 'ADMIN' ORDER BY A.NAME
